name: Roy Tang
text: Kaya nga sila nagpapa-invite so they can investigate if there are such violations. If you'll read the above paragraph it only states that the president has made statements scorning international human rights law, wala pang accusation that the government is perpetrating killings. In my opinion, statements made by the administration using language that encourages killing (using terms like "shoot to kill", "execute", and so on) followed by an upsurge in people dying during police operations is sufficient basis to investigate forther
